verses.verse: That which<WG3739> was<WG2258> from<WG575> the beginning,<WG746> which<WG3739> we have heard,<WG191> which<WG3739> we have seen<WG3708> with our<WG2257> eyes,<WG3788> which<WG3739> we have looked upon,<WG2300> and<WG2532> our<WG2257> hands<WG5495> have handled,<WG5584> of<WG4012> the<WG3588> Word<WG3056> of life;<WG2222>

(For <WG2532> the<WG3588> life<WG2222> was manifested,<WG5319> and<WG2532> we have seen<WG3708> it, and<WG2532> bear witness,<WG3140> and<WG2532> show<WG518> unto you<WG5213> that eternal<WG166> life,<WG2222> which<WG3748> was<WG2258> with<WG4314> the<WG3588> Father,<WG3962> and<WG2532> was manifested<WG5319> unto us;)<WG2254>

That which<WG3739> we have seen<WG3708> and<WG2532> heard<WG191> declare<WG518> we unto you,<WG5213> that<WG2443> ye<WG5210> also<WG2532> may have<WG2192> fellowship<WG2842> with<WG3326> us:<WG2257> and<WG2532> truly<WG1161> our<WG2251> fellowship<WG2842> is with<WG3326> the<WG3588> Father,<WG3962> and<WG2532> with<WG3326> his<WG848> Son<WG5207> Jesus<WG2424> Christ.<WG5547>
And <WG2532> these things<WG5023> write<WG1125> we unto you,<WG5213> that<WG2443> your<WG5216> joy<WG5479> may be<WG5600> full.<WG4137>

This <WG3778> then<WG2532> is<WG2076> the<WG3588> message<WG1860> which<WG3739> we have heard<WG191> of<WG575> him,<WG846> and<WG2532> declare<WG312> unto you,<WG5213> that<WG3754> God<WG2316> is<WG2076> light,<WG5457> and<WG2532> in<WG1722> him<WG846> is<WG2076> no<WG3756> darkness<WG4653> at all.<WG3762>

If <WG1437> we say<WG2036> that<WG3754> we have<WG2192> fellowship<WG2842> with<WG3326> him,<WG846> and<WG2532> walk<WG4043> in<WG1722> darkness,<WG4655> we lie,<WG5574> and<WG2532> do<WG4160> not<WG3756> the<WG3588> truth: <WG225>

But <WG1161> if<WG1437> we walk<WG4043> in<WG1722> the<WG3588> light,<WG5457> as<WG5613> he<WG846> is<WG2076> in<WG1722> the<WG3588> light,<WG5457> we have<WG2192> fellowship<WG2842> one with another,<WG240> <WG3326> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> blood<WG129> of Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547> his<WG846> Son<WG5207> cleanseth<WG2511> us<WG2248> from<WG575> all<WG3956> sin.<WG266>
If <WG1437> we say<WG2036> that<WG3754> we have<WG2192> no<WG3756> sin,<WG266> we deceive<WG4105> ourselves,<WG1438> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> truth<WG225> is<WG2076> not<WG3756> in<WG1722> us.<WG2254>

If <WG1437> we confess<WG3670> our<WG2257> sins,<WG266> he is<WG2076> faithful<WG4103> and<WG2532> just<WG1342> to<WG2443> forgive<WG863> us<WG2254> our sins,<WG266> and<WG2532> to cleanse<WG2511> us<WG2248> from<WG575> all<WG3956> unrighteousness.<WG93>
If <WG1437> we say<WG2036> that<WG3754> we have not<WG3756> sinned,<WG264> we make<WG4160> him<WG846> a liar,<WG5583> and<WG2532> his<WG848> word<WG3056> is<WG2076> not<WG3756> in<WG1722> us.<WG2254>
